frontendCapabilities.demoAction: Show main dashboard layout and navigation
Demonstrate map interactions and hazard layers
Show evacuation route planning and optimization

frontendCapabilities.description: Different views for different user roles
frontendCapabilities.demoAction: Switch between different user role views
Show weather data integration and updates
Demonstrate button clicks and panel interactions

videoRequirements.content: Brief overview of disaster response challenges
videoRequirements.narration: In fast-moving disasters, minutes matter. Here's how our disaster response dashboard cuts decision time dramatically.
Emergency managers face fragmented data, slow coordination, and dangerous routing that puts evacuees in harm's way.
Our unified dashboard provides emergency commanders, first responders, and government agencies with a single platform for coordinated action.

videoRequirements.visual: Show map interactions, zoom, pan, layer toggles
videoRequirements.narration: The multi-hazard map integrates real-time data from multiple sources, providing a comprehensive view of current threats.
With one click, we generate safe evacuation routes that avoid danger zones. Routes dynamically adjust based on real-time conditions.

videoRequirements.content: Different interfaces for different user roles
videoRequirements.visual: Switch between commander, responder, and public views
videoRequirements.narration: Different user roles see tailored interfaces - commanders get strategic overviews, while responders see tactical details.

videoRequirements.visual: Show AIP decision support panel and recommendations
videoRequirements.narration: Our AI system analyzes patterns and provides real-time recommendations for resource allocation and response strategies.

videoRequirements.visual: Demonstrate weather panel and data updates
videoRequirements.narration: Real-time weather data from NOAA and other sources helps predict how conditions will affect response operations.
Drag units to staging areas and watch ETAs and coverage update instantly. The system optimizes resource allocation.

videoRequirements.visual: Demonstrate real-time data feeds and alerts
videoRequirements.narration: As conditions change, routes and priorities update automatically. This is real-time decision support that keeps pace with the disaster.

videoRequirements.visual: Show system architecture or technical details
videoRequirements.narration: Built with React and Mapbox GL for stunning 3D visualization, Python services for real-time analysis, and enterprise data fusion via Foundry.

videoRequirements.visual: Show impact metrics and cost savings
videoRequirements.narration: The result: dramatically faster coordination and meaningful cost avoidance during major events. Our goal: 65 to 90 percent faster emergency coordination.

videoRequirements.visual: Show contact information or next steps
videoRequirements.narration: We're seeking pilot partners to validate across regions and hazards. This isn't just technology - it's a lifeline for communities facing disaster.
